title: Claimed by Cupid
description: Date a Silver Fox? Check.Share your New Year’s kiss with said Fox? Check.Have a Big O during Valentine’s Day dinner? Check.Wait…what was that last one?Holly is quickly falling for Nick, and she can’t wait to spend their first Valentine's Day together.And, boy, does this Silver Fox have a surprise up his sleeve.A very public surprise.But this isn’t just about lust anymore, and Nick is tired of taking things slowly.Cupid’s arrow is pointed directly at Holly.This holiday, Nick is claiming her as his own.
author: Dana Isaly
